reposInspected.name: archonx-os
findings: No existing docs/ecosystem/services/cli directories for Access Kernel.
Existing ops skeleton and compliance runner available under ops/.
Suitable as greenfield host for new subsystem.

reposInspected.name: dashboard-agent-swarm
findings: Frontend routing in src/App.tsx and nav in src/components/AppSidebar.tsx.
Backend API in backend/server/src/index.ts with route modules under backend/server/src/routes.
Can add Access Kernel pages and a backend proxy route with minimal diffs.

reposInspected.name: devika-agent
findings: Current usage is mostly read-only GET calls; write-call guard can be enforced centrally in _request method.
CLI exists at src/cli/__init__.py for future command-level integration.

reposInspected.name: agent-zero-Fork
findings: Proxy endpoint at src/app/api/proxy/agents/route.ts is suitable to enforce work_item_id + Access Kernel checks before external calls.

reposInspected.name: clawdbot-Whatsapp-agent
findings: Modular TypeScript codebase; suitable place for approval status/links utility under src/agents/.
No need to expose secrets; integration can remain message/status only.

reposInspected.name: paulisworld-openclaw-3d
findings: Room/IPC project cloned and inspected; no direct Access Kernel changes required for v1 deliverables.

mapping: CLI login patterns (client/common/commands/login) inform one-shot login UX.
Policy/access and access-log proto models indicate deny/allow and audit-first architecture.
Secretless access/gateway concepts reused as design inputs; no wholesale replacement.

repoSubstitutions.status: not-clonable in current environment (SSH denied, HTTPS repo not found)
